content.text:
Turns out that this may actually break sbot -- I noted that [@libra.fraction.io](@gTsBPQbdSd763h0qoZsBjPlgWbhKKmMFW8kmTv/XrV8=.ed25519) could see my blobs, but it looks like [my test message](%eiiugavGmKag+XK0r9SqGgAJX25rea9Z5ILKY2D91XY=.sha256) actually kept me from replicating. Maybe #scuttlebot was trying to replicate the mapped result rather than the original message? Hmm.

Disabling the plugin seems to have started pushing my messages out again, so I'm no longer #marooned, but I'm unsure what's going on under the hood. Maybe someone else is more familiar with the innards of `sbot`?

cc: [@dominic](@EMovhfIrFk4NihAKnRNhrfRaqIhBv1Wj8pTxJNgvCCY=.ed25519) [@mmckegg](@FbGoHeEcePDG3Evemrc+hm+S77cXKf8BRQgkYinJggg=.ed25519) [@arj](@6CAxOI3f+LUOVrbAl0IemqiS7ATpQvr9Mdw9LC4+Uv0=.ed25519) [@cryptix](@p13zSAiOpguI9nsawkGijsnMfWmFd5rlUNpzekEE+vI=.ed25519) [@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519)
